metadata.title: CVE-2016-3855 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: drivers/thermal/supply_lm_core.c in the Qualcomm components in Androidbefore 2016-08-05 does not validate a certain count parameter, which allowsattackers to cause a denial of service (out-of-bounds array access) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted application, akaQualcomm internal bug CR990824.

criterions.comment: linux-goldfish: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
